thread.title: Australia to deport American anti-abortion activist
thread.title_full: Australia to deport American anti-abortion activist | News24

author: news24.com
title: Australia to deport American anti-abortion activist
text:
Sydney - An American anti-abortion activist is expected to be deported from Australia, after the nation's highest court ruled on Friday that he posed a threat to public order amid concerns he could incite violence against women.
Troy Newman, president of the Kansas-based anti-abortion group Operation Rescue, was detained at Melbourne Airport on Thursday after trying to enter Australia even though officials had already cancelled his visa.
The battle to prevent Newman from coming to Australia for a speaking tour began earlier this week, after a lawmaker sent a letter to Immigration Minister Peter Dutton saying Newman could pose a threat to community safety.
"I am most concerned that Mr Newman's call for abortionists to be executed could lead to threats or the commission of acts of violence against women and medical professionals," wrote Terri Butler, a member of the opposition Labour Party.
